title: Calligraphic work of art on your desktop
content:
Musée d’art contemporain de Montréal is offering, for download, a quite beautiful calligraphic work of art by Lyne Lapointe. Set your desktops!

[http://www.macm.org/fr/fond.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122127/http:/www.macm.org/fr/fond.html "http://www.macm.org/fr/fond.html")

Direct link to the 1024 X 768 file [http://www.macm.org/wallpapers/5\_1024px.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122127/http:/www.macm.org/wallpapers/5_1024px.jpg "http://www.macm.org/wallpapers/5\_1024px.jpg")

 [‹ 98 Degrees in the shade, to hot in the shade](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122127/http:/typophile.com/node/14347 "Go to previous forum topic") [Font with the most attractive "K" and "k"? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122127/http:/typophile.com/node/14329 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Martin LAllier

comments.content:
That sure is nice! Thanks for the link.

Now, whatever happenned to the beautiful desktop wallpapers that used to be offered here???
